name: Present War
description:
Present Wars is a Space Invaders styled game where you go on a quest to save the world from evil presents.

There's two modes:

Main Quest - Go through multiple levels with two bosses to save the world + some dialogue

Arcade - Just some quick levels with nothing added in

Content packs and updates will come out for free until Febuary or March 2019. So leave comments of glitches you find or things you want added.

Originally made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 game jam.
